snippet.title: 123 Kids Fun Alphabet | iOS and Android App for Toddlers and Preschoolers | Educational Apps
snippet.description:
The Application is prepared in a way to allow your child to independently learn the alphabet without your assistance.

App Store
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/123-kids-fun-alphabet-lite/id496816849?mt=8

Google Play
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.rosapp.AlfabetEngLite

Recommended for teachers! Each letter has been illustrated with four words, one of which is animated and enriched with a sound characteristic for a specific object. Just tap the first picture of each letter.

Designed for children to start their adventure with the alphabet. The application is perfect for homeschooling! The combination of letters with pictures and a readers’ recording is a very effective method to quickly and enjoyably learn the alphabet.


*** appymall.com ***
"Perfect for preschoolers, kindergartners or special education students."

*** theappyladies.com ***
"Its a great app to learn the alphabet with and also how to write the letters. I had my five year old doing it and he loved it."

*** socialnomics.net ***
"The best part of this app is that here are no confusing menus or navigation – just, bright and colourful designs that kids will love."


KIDS LEARN WHILE THEY PLAY!

• SPELLING 
Correctly spell several words in a row and they’ll be rewarded with a sticker.

• POINTING LETTERS
Voice requests your child to touch a specific letter.

• HANDWRITING while playing a fun game. 
After each letter is finished they are combined on a excercise book with your full alphabet.

FEATURES:

• Interactive, carefully conceived, captivating games
• Letter and word definition
• Designed for Kids: No confusing menus or navigation. Bright, colorful, child-friendly design
• Rewards!
• Dozens of sounds and voice recordings of colors, letter, fruit names...
• Hundreds of rich graphics, vibrant sounds and beautiful captivating special effects
• App designed for iPad/iPhone/iPod Touch - download once works everywhere!
• Background music off/on option.


---

Subscribe
http://www.youtube.com/user/123kidsfun?sub_confirmation=1
